```typescript
// ...existing code...
async getActionsCount(id: string) {
  const data = await this.supabase.from('actions').select('id', { count: 'exact' }).eq('id', id);
  return data;
}
// ...existing code...
```

### [events.service.ts](file:///Users/geissbnj/projects/vbcode-ng/src/services/events.service.ts)

Add documentation comments for the `getActionsCount` method.

```typescript
// ...existing code...
  /**
   * Get the count of actions for a specific game.
   * @param id - The ID of the game.
   * @returns The count of actions for the specified game.
   */
  async getActionsCount(id: string) {
    return await this.supabase.from('actions').select('id', { count: 'exact' }).eq('game_id', id);
  }
// ...existing code...
```
